entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -34.7°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
